sentences.sentence: He made himself so killingly funny that he was the envy and admiration of the whole mangy rabble.
sentences.translation: 他把自己弄得那么滑稽可笑，弄得所有肮脏的歹徒都既嫉妒又钦佩。

sentences.sentence: Well if it isn't our old mangy transient grandfather.
sentences.translation: 好，如果这不是我们肮脏的，短暂的祖父。

sentences.sentence: That mangy hound of yours just cost me a bucket of milk!
sentences.translation: 你那卑鄙的猎犬又让我损失了一桶牛奶！
